body:
okay I think I understand what happened.

The guy in charge of handing out lottery winnings chose him as a mark to take all his money.

behind the scenes his wife and daughter were brought to the island and the combined cost of his initial yellow, gold upgrade and his wife and daughters reds completely drained his account.

the murder is one part karma and one part best case scenario cause no one to cause a fuss later and leak info/lawyers/etc. Then just keep the wife and daughter on the island to attract more marks

and on and on the cycle goes.

Also is it weird I'm sad there wasn't an independent scene with the Wacdonald's girl?
the art was good but the plot and the story suck and my pp was very confuse

Then wtf is the job of his wife? it must have been high at least because if the payment is each girls he fucks then there's no way in hell his wife's job isn't at least decent adding to that, the daughter even bought a red ticket

Wait wait, so what the fuck his wife job then?
I mean his salary won't be able to pay all of the tax of red level, right?
Pretty weird huh
What is exactly happened
Does anyone know what happened to the wife, how the wife and daughter got to the island in the first place, and what the picture was all about? Because I am really curious.

Lol, fascinating how they got back at him. It’s like a place where the rules favour NTR ugly bastards but they still fuck him over rather than let him get away with it like they do in normal NTR hentai. I like it
I need more like this,someone recomen please
RIP MC #LLUB🕊
sigh... ugly bastard... but thankfully the title and the plot neutralizes it. 8/10
Lol saw that coming
dude deserved that shit
well my thought is that he got his shit cut off him or head whatever but the trash just got dumped and the price the head and the dick
I don't know what to say about this just wow, both bad and weird (´･Д･)」
Haha the guy got what he deserved at the end. Even on an island with "free to fuck any girl below your rank" still have rules i guess
There isn't a tag for a guy fucking around but you can try with time stop
more like this please..
I like this type, some asshole walk around and fuck girls, what the type is this ?
It was trash...but some parts shined and the ending was liked. I'm sure you're a great artist and should always be seeking to improve.
